p: From an overarching perspective, the transition from MDGs to SDGs cannot be considered smooth. Many changes have occurred in the development agenda; above all, today's priorities focus on sustainability and the inclusion of industrialised countries as depositary of the development goals (Sachs, 2012). Furthermore, the world we are living in is increasingly exposed to global shocks and adverse events, calling for a systemic interpretation of complex phenomena (Kumar et al., 2016; Gatto et al., 2022).
